creator: ishiba.atsushi@jp.panasonic.com
text:
I have windows 2008 running apache 2.2.27 server with Tomcat 5.5.11.

I found the following messages only once, 
[Fri Jul 23 20:29:12 2010] [warn] Server ran out of threads to serve requests. Consider raising the ThreadsPerChild setting
At this time, client did not receive the normal response from server.

After 100 minutes of silence, I found the following messages. this timer(6000 sec) depends on httpd-default.conf
[Fri Jul 23 22:06:29 2010] [error] (OS 10060) xxxxx  : ajp_ilink_receive() can't receive header
[Fri Jul 23 22:06:29 2010] [error] ajp_read_header: ajp_ilink_receive failed
[Fri Jul 23 22:06:29 2010] [error] (120006)APR does not understand this error code: proxy: dialog to 127.0.0.1:8009 (localhost) failed

Please tell me more about this problem.

Bugzilla is not a support forum, ask your question on the tomcat and/or httpd
users lists (not both at once).
creator: wrowe@apache.org
